mapper.select: SELECT TSD.id , TSD.nm , TSD.door_sch_id , TDC.door_sch_nm , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( TD.id SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_DOOR TD WHERE TD.sch_doorgrp_id = TSD.id ) AS door_ids , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( TD.door_nm SEPARATOR '/') FROM T_DOOR TD WHERE TD.sch_doorgrp_id = TSD.id ) AS door_nms , (SELECT COUNT(TD.id) FROM T_DOOR TD WHERE TD.sch_doorgrp_id = TSD.id ) AS door_cnt , DATE_FORMAT(TSD.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_at , DATE_FORMAT(TSD.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as updated_at FROM T_SCH_DOORGRP TSD LEFT JOIN T_DOOR_SCH TDC ON TSD.door_sch_id = TDC.id WHERE TSD.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SCH_DOORGRP SET door_sch_id = null , updated_at= NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(TSD.id) AS vCnt FROM T_SCH_DOORGRP TSD WHERE 1 = 1 AND replace(TSD.nm, ' ', '') = replace(#{doorGroupNm}, ' ', '')
